biotools.summary: Computational tool for the analysis of the Mode of Action (MoA) of novel drugs and the identification of known and approved candidates for “drug repositioning”. It is based on network theory and non-parametric statistics on gene expression data.

bioschemas.name: MANTRA
bioschemas.summary: Computational tool for the analysis of the Mode of Action (MoA) of novel drugs and the identification of known and approved candidates for “drug repositioning”. It is based on network theory and non-parametric statistics on gene expression data.
